item.description:
Somerville's Annual Sci-fi 24 hour marathon is looking forward to their 35 consecutive year. Patty and I only discovered it last year and it was a blast. Yes you are in a movie seat for 24 straight hours. Somerville serves alcohol, but you can bring as much food and soda as you want. Bring blankets, pillow etc. to make you comfortable. There are full length movies all sci-fi. Current Movies to 50's features. Directors show up, there are contests, coffee and donuts. Some celebrities show up.

Follow the Movies as they are posted on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.c...
